    <script>
     $(document).ready(function () {
                 master.init();
 
                 //Adicina class para ipad
                 var isiPad = navigator.userAgent.match(/iPad/i) != null;
                 if (isiPad == true) { $('html').addClass("iPad"); }
 
                 $(document).on('click', ".btnlogin", function () {
                     if ($(".divlogin").is(':visible')) {
 
                         $(".divlogin").stop(true, true).slideUp(200, function () { $(".btnlogin").removeClass("close"); });
                     } else {
                         $(".divlogin").stop(true, true).slideDown(200);
                     }
                 });
 
                 //Submenu
                 $(".linkProdutos").click(function () {
                     $(".link").removeClass("active");
                     $(this).addClass("active");
                     $(".sub_menu_empresa").slideToggle("fast");
                 });
 
                 if ($("html").hasClass("msie8")) {
                     $('input, textarea').placeholder();
                 }
 
             });
    </script>
    <script src="/js/libs/jquery.bxslider.min.js">
    </script>
    <script src="/js/jquery.centerfill.js">
    </script>
    <script type="text/javascript">
     var larguraini;
         var slider_array = new Array();
         //var elementos_array = [".img_banner",".img_slide_b",".img_not",".img_dist",".img_quldd"];
 
         $(window).load(function () {
             $(".imgcf").centerfill({
                 loaded: "l1",
                 il: ".imgHolder",
                 callback: function () {
                     tsliders();
                 }
             });
         });
 
         $(document).ready(function () {
             if ($(window).width() < 1100) { larguraini = "small"; }
             else { larguraini = "large"; }
         });
 
         $(window).resize(function () {
             responsive();
         }).trigger("resize");
 
         function responsive() {
             var ratio = 0.833;
             //var contDiv = $("#default");
             var ww = $(window).width();
             //contDiv.height(Math.round(ww * ratio));
             if (ww < 1100 && larguraini == "large") {
                 $(".imgcf").centerfill({
                     loaded: "l1",
                     rracio: true,
                     il: ".imgHolder"
                 });
                 larguraini = "small";
             }
             if (ww > 1100 && larguraini == "small") {
                 $(".imgcf").centerfill({
                     loaded: "l1",
                     rracio: true,
                     il: ".imgHolder"
                 });
                 larguraini = "large";
             }
         }
 
         function tsliders() {
             $('.bxslider').each(function (i) {
                 slider_array[i] = $(this).bxSlider({
                     circular: false,
                     auto: false,
                     infinite: false,
                     hideControlOnEnd: true,
                     pager: ($(this).find(".banner").length > 1) ? true : false,
                     controls: false
                 });
             });
             slider_array[0].startAuto();
         }
    </script>
